text: Woh Allah Taalaa aisa hai jiss ney tum ko aik tan-e-wahid say peda kiya aur iss say uss ka jora banaya takay woh iss apney joray say unss hasil keray phir jab miyan ney biwi say qurbat ki to uss ko hamal reh gaya halka sa. So woh uss ko liye huye phirti rahi phri jab woh bojhal hogaee to dono miyan biwi Allah say jo unn ka maalik hai dua kerney lagay kay agar tu ney hum ko sahih saalim aulad dey di to hum khoob shukar guzari keren gay
